name: Dr. Todd Pierzchala and Associates
tag_list: optometrist, quakertown, pa, eye-doctor, greenville, pennsylvania, eye-exam, eye-care, contact-lenses, eyeglasses, dr--todd-pierzchala-and-associates
overview:
Dr. Todd Pierzchala and Associates is an optometry practice situated in Quakertown, PA and East Greenville, PA. Their optometrists offer eye care services in the form of eye exams and treatment for people who are suffering from vision problems. They also provide prescriptions for contact lenses and eyeglasses.

Dr. Todd Pierzchala and Associates provides the following eye care services:

  • Eye exams
  • LASIK consultations
  • Contact lens fitting
  • Pediatric eye exams
  • Glaucoma screening and testing
  • Cataracts diagnosis
  • Dry eye treatments
  • Macular degeneration diagnosis

This optometry practice also offers a variety of eyewear in both their Quakertown and Greenville, Pennsylvania offices. They carry deisgner frames and sunglasses from major brand name manufacturers.

The eye doctors at Dr. Todd Pierzchala and Associates use the latest advancements in eye care technology and equipment which enables them to diagnose and treat ocular diseases with greater accuracy.

This optometry practice is located inside WalMart.

offices.address1: Walmart  Vision Center 195 N. West End Blvd.
